name: Onto Innovation Inc.
description: Onto Innovation Inc. is a leading supplier of advanced metrology and inspection systems used in the semiconductor manufacturing process. The company was formed in 2020 through the merger of two established firms, Nanometrics and Rudolph Technologies, both of which have a rich history in providing cutting-edge technology for the semiconductor industry. Onto Innovation focuses on enabling manufacturers to optimize their processes to improve yield and reduce costs in the production of chips. The company offers a broad range of products that include optical and X-ray metrology systems, defect inspection tools, and software solutions that utilize artificial intelligence and machine learning for data analysis. With the increasing demand for semiconductors across various sectors, including automotive, consumer electronics, and telecommunications, Onto Innovation is well-positioned to address the evolving needs of its customers. The company’s commitment to innovation and quality is evident in its continuous investment in research and development, ensuring that its technologies keep pace with the rapid advancements in semiconductor fabrication. Onto Innovation aims to drive efficiency and sustainability in semiconductor manufacturing, supporting the global shift towards more advanced and energy-efficient technologies.
